Description:
Near New Family-Sized Townhouse
Quietly located at the rear of a boutique group in the bowl of a cul-de-sac, this three bedroom, two bathroom townhouse flaunts an innovative design that offers privacy and prestige. Just one year old, it features a dedicated entry hall with guest powder room and Euro laundry through to two generous living spaces awash with natural light.
With high quality timber floors underfoot, the entry level has an exciting entertaining focus boasting a gourmet 2-pac stone kitchen with island bench, Westinghouse appliances and sliding doors to a north-facing garden and alfresco.
Flexibility is assured with three robed bedrooms plus a fourth bedroom/study option ideal for a large or growing family. The master includes its own ensuite and WIR while the remaining bedrooms share a deluxe main bathroom with separate WC.
A celebration of contemporary excellence, the home also features a remote double garage with rear roller door and internal access, gas ducted heating, split system A/C, ducted vacuum, a security system and water tank.
Well-placed to access Croydon Station, Churinga Shopping Village, Dorset Golf Course, schools and parks.

Description:
Renovate or develop on prime corner.
AUCTION: Saturday 14th December at 2:00pm (unless sold prior)
This large 864m2 (approx.) corner block is occupied by a single-level residence that is in need of a little tender loving care. Big rewards are waiting for the shrewd buyer who can see the potential in renovating the existing dwelling, building a new home or perhaps developing the land and constructing units in its place (subject to council approval).
Making the most of its north-facing orientation, this spacious four-bedroom home has been thoughtfully positioned to ensure the driveway and double garage are accessible from Mirang Avenue, providing manoeuvring ease.
Beyond the solid brick exterior, the home features a comfortable lounge with natural floorboards, neutral tones and large windows inviting sunlight into the room. The family area provides a second space for relaxation, leading outdoors to an enclosed entertaining zone to expand the available living options.
Light filled, the kitchen is fitted with abundant cupboard space and comprises a 900mm dual-fuel cooker, dishwasher, breakfast bar and adjoining meals area. The tiled floor and splashback offer a practical finish while the contrast between the benchtops and cabinetry are also appreciable.
The large master features a walk-in robe and full ensuite boasting a spa and shower, quietly positioned away from the additional three robed bedrooms which are zoned together. The nearby bathroom incorporates a separate bath, shower and adjoining toilet. Further benefits include; gas ducted heating, evaporative cooling, multiple split system air-conditioning units, sunblinds, shed/workshop and bungalow.
The home is conveniently located only a short stroll from Dorset Recreation Reserve, Merrindale Shopping Centre, Tarralla Creek, Croydon Gums Kindergarten, bus stop, Dorset Primary School, Swinburne TAFE, as well as being in close connection with Croydon Railway Station, Tintern Grammar, hospitals, tennis courts, Croydon Memorial Pool and EastLink freeway.
Whether you're a first-home buyer, builder, tradesperson, handyperson or developer looking for their next project, this property offers unlimited potential.

Description:
Character & Charm Meet Modern
From the early days Alto Avenue has been one of Croydon's most sought after residential locations with its large allotments, elevated position, peaceful treed environment and convenient access to town & station.
This private & appealing residence set in grounds of 1480sqm (approx) and surrounded by tranquil mature gardens combines comfort & character with modern style, facilities & convenience in this ideal locale.
From the vine covered front verandah entry leads either to the formal lounge with bay window and dining room or to the expansive open plan living with polished hardwood floors and impressive central kitchen, all of which open via bi fold doors to a full length deck/entertaining area oriented around maximising indoor/outdoor living. Stone paths then lead to a paved patio under the golden elm or to secret garden nooks and a chook shed (chooks optional).
There are four bedrooms with flexible use including an indulgent master suite with separate dressing room, lots of robes and full bathroom with spa bath for two. The main bathroom is stunning and the bed/studio & ensuite downstairs provides a guest room, teenage getaway, or office/activities option. Inside gas central heating, cooling and cosy gas log fire provide comfort and the storerooms, cellars, shedding & water tanks add practicality.
The wide fronted site allows the option of two driveways one to a brick double garage and the other providing access to the fully fenced rear garden via double gates which provide security for van, boat or trailer.
Quality schools surround including Yarra Valley Grammar, Luther College & Oxley College whilst Croydon Main Street cafes and restaurants, the Yarra valley, Eastland & East Link are all close by.
